nodes.text: Denis Rygelli, known as "Reggie", was a Human male technician serving with the Alliance to Restore the Republic. Having repaired everything from starships to droids, Rygelli decided that he wanted to do more for the Rebellion, and attended a briefing headed by General Airen Cracken alongside Carns Capra, Ben Spax and Trinna Orani, on the procedures for establishing a Rebel cell structure on an Imperial-held planet. A good man at heart, he was nervous about his choice to switch from technical work to field work.
